section.name: Common modules
section.p: Mevenide UI part for Netbeans and Eclipse relies on a few common non-ui modules :

ul.li: Mevenide Core provides Maven POM manipulation helpers
Mevenide Goals Grabber provides a framework for grabbing Maven goals and reports
Mevenide Config provides a framework to allow to lookup different kind of propoerties
Mevenide Grammar provides an api to facilitate code completion proposal retrieval
